game.name: EVE Online: 1 Multiple Character Training
game.genres: Action, Free To Play, Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Strategy
game.categories: Multi-player, MMO, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Downloadable Content, Steam Trading Cards
game.shortDescription: 다수의 캐릭터를 육성하여 뉴에덴 각지로 진출하세요! 다중 캐릭터 훈련(MCT)을 사용하면 훈련 대기열을 오가지 않고 손쉽게 부 캐릭터를 육성할 수 있습니다. MCT 자격증을 활성화하고 복수의 대기열을 추가로 개방하세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Train more characters to grow your influence in New Eden! MCT is a simple way to train up to two alternative characters while skipping the hassle of juggling skill queues. Activate an MCT token and reap the benefits of up to two more skill queues!
